entry.title: New release for PicoShare: 1.4.2
entry.content:
Bugfixes

  • Gracefully handle errors when creating guest links by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/548
  • Allow user to dismiss error on settings page by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/551
  • Always re-enable the save button on settings page by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/550

Improvements

  • Provide richer data about disk space usage by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/537
  • Compress release binaries with gzip by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/522
  • Use the Go-builtin (more extensive) file extension -> mimetype mapping by @blinkingtwelve in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/526
  • Print version information in app by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/529

Breaking changes

This release drops support for the -vacuum command:

  • Drop support for DB vacuum by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/532

New Contributors

  • @blinkingtwelve made their first contribution in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/526

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/compare/1.4.1...1.4.2

entry.title: New release for PicoShare: 1.4.5
entry.content:

  • Assert against result object instead of recorder by @jotaen in #609

Improvements

  • Make file expiry for guest links configurable when creating guest links by @Balk-Z in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/613
  • Link download count to download history by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/612
  • Use long filepaths in server logs by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/584
  • Upgrade to go 1.23.3 by @mtlynch in https://github.com/mtlynch/picoshare/pull/605
